pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Saturday, January 8, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at a virtual commemoration event to mark the second anniversary of the Ukraine International Airlines Flight 752 tragedy. Minister of Foreign Affairs Mélanie Joly and Minister of Transport Omar Alghabra will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • The virtual ceremony will be livestreamed via the Association of Families of Flight PS752 Victims’ YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/ps752justice
